Package: com.android.build.gradle.api

[Java] Interface TestVariant

      • com.android.build.gradle.api.TestVariant
      • All Superinterfaces:
        ApkVariant, BaseVariant

        A Build variant and all its public data.

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            org.gradle.api.DefaultTask getConnectedInstrumentTest()
            Returns the task to run the tests.
            List<? extends org.gradle.api.DefaultTask> getProviderInstrumentTests()
            Returns the task to run the tests.
            BaseVariant getTestedVariant()
            Returns the build variant that is tested by this variant.
